about_the_game:
HIGH-OCTANE EXPLOSIVE FUN

Step into the driver's seat and save Earth from an alien invasion in Guncar Arena! This high-stakes, top-down shooter blends bullet hell action with vehicular combat and roguelite elements for non-stop explosive fun.

As a fearless renegade, you'll pilot a muscle car loaded with weapons, taking on wave after wave of alien attackers. But this is no ordinary vehicle - upgrade your weapons, discover special powers and create a one-of-a-kind, unstoppable Guncar.

With fast-paced, drift-filled gameplay, every moment is a chance to prove your skills. So rev up your engine, keep your foot on the gas, and get ready to blast your way to victory!

TWITTER

Follow us on Twitter for the latest updates:

name: Guncar Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Guncar Arena is a chaos-fueled action game with bullet hell battles on wheels. Outrun your enemies in high-speed chases and obliterate alien invaders and rogue vehicles to unlock explosive new abilities. Survive the mayhem, fight your way through relentless foes, and stop the alien invasion!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
